name: soundpot
description: Soundpot is a playful and accessible musical framework where users can play and combine distinct sound objects.

scripts.start:backend: cd backend && conda run --no-capture-output -n soundpot python3 main.py
scripts.install:backend: conda create -n soundpot -y && cd backend && conda run --no-capture-output -n soundpot pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.get_vae: cd backend && conda run --no-capture-output -n soundpot python3 get_vae.py
